name: meme-search
description: Meme Search is a self-hosted tool that indexes meme images, extracts text using OCR, and allows fast search through a simple web interface, making it easy to find memes stored in a personal collection.
features: OCR indexing: Extract text from meme images using optical character recognition for searchability.
Image upload: Add memes to your collection through drag-and-drop or bulk upload.
Text search: Find memes by searching for text that appears in the image.
Tag system: Apply custom tags to memes for categorization and filtering.
Thumbnail generation: Automatically create thumbnails for fast browsing of large collections.
Quick preview: View full-size memes without leaving the search interface.
Duplicate detection: Identify and manage duplicate memes in your collection.
Batch processing: Index multiple memes simultaneously for faster collection building.
Export functionality: Download individual memes or entire search results as archives.
Mobile responsive: Search and browse memes from any device with responsive interface.
Privacy focused: All memes and search data stored locally on your server.
Lightweight: Minimal resource requirements make it suitable for small servers or personal use.
